meanings.sent1: I need to recharge my phone before it runs out of battery.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic recharged the car battery to ensure it would start smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The robot recharged itself by plugging into the power source.
meanings.sent4: The flashlight was recharged and ready to light up the dark night.
meanings.sent5: The solar panel recharged the battery during the day to power the lights at night.
